channel.title: Contagion: a New Indie Source Game
channel.description:
[align=center][img]https://www.halflife2.net/wp-content/uploads/2010/08/Contagion_Logo.jpg[/img][/align]
Looks half decent. Nice to see some more non-Valve (Commercial? I don't know it might be free,) Source games.
Contagion is the spiritual predecessor to Zombie Panic: Source, and is being made by the same team.
[url='https://www.indiedb.com/games/contagion/news/contagion-revealed']Check out there indieDB page for non-concept art pictures.[/url]
[url='https://www.monochrome-games.com/']Or their forums where they'll be looking for alpha testers soon.[/url]
[url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0yEtCKUco5w']You can view the trailer at Youtube.[/url]
Concept Art:
[img]https://www.halflife2.net/news_images/201008/1281390884_Contagion_PD_Concept01.jpg[/img]
[img]https://www.halflife2.net/news_images/201008/1281390884_Contagion_PD_Concept02.jpg[/img]
[img]https://www.halflife2.net/news_images/201008/1281390884_Contagion_Promo01.jpg[/img]

item.title: Contagion: a New Indie Source Game
item.dc:creator: Surplus
item.description:
The amount of content they show makes it extremely difficult to give a fuck. About all I know about this game is that there are inmates and a dog.

Read full topic
